definition: carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: So there are a lot of photographs in this collection that no one has seen before.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在這部精選集裏有很多照片是沒有人看到過的。

sentences.english: Check out Buck's selection of tapered and pocket sharpeners.
sentences.chinese: 購買巴克精選的錐形磨刀器和口袋磨刀器。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精選的長袖休閒襯衫採用現代和古典風格。

sentences.english: It selects top grade raw materials in the Land of Abundance, and is produced with our advanced techniques.
sentences.chinese: 精選天府之國優質原料，採用盈棚技術精工製作。

sentences.english: Material selection for imported cowhide, sheepskin, such as crocodile skin.
sentences.chinese: 製作材料精選爲進口牛皮，羊皮，鱷魚皮等。

sentences.english: EUROPEAN FOLK contains examples of the design of everyday textiles and costumes of rural Central and South-Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 本書精選中歐和東南歐部的日常服飾設計實例。

sentences.english: Well-selected Beijing operas for your enjoyment .
sentences.chinese: 精選的京劇，京劇愛好者的聽覺享受。

sentences.english: Tom: Ok, a bottle of the house red please!
sentences.chinese: 好的，那就來一瓶精選的紅酒吧。

sentences.english: Books, like friends , should be few and well chosen.
sentences.chinese: 書如同朋友一樣，宜少和宜精選。

sentences.english: It is manually curated and currently holds 3782 antimicrobial sequences.
sentences.chinese: 它是人工精選的，當前包含有3782個抗菌肽序列。

sentences.english: Pick your strongest line-up and prove to me that the defence is in top form.
sentences.chinese: 精選你的強壯排成直線並且跟我證明防衛以頂端形式。

sentences.english: Bocanegra badging is featured dead-center on the hatch.
sentences.chinese: 格拉標誌是精選死中心孵化。

sentences.english: For selected items, there are videos featuring discussions by expert curators.
sentences.chinese: 對一些精選展品內容，還配有文史專家的討論視頻。

sentences.english: The perfect balance of espresso and frothed milk.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡和精選牛奶的完美平衡。

sentences.english: We carefully choose only the eye round beef with highest quality, which has the big shape, tender taste and regular shape.
sentences.chinese: 精選優質牛肉的圓眼肉部分，塊狀粗大，肉質鮮嫩。

sentences.english: Made of selected malleable steel making them virtually unbreakable.
sentences.chinese: 本體材質採用精選的展性鑄鐵不易破裂變形。

definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
